#Text=TOD THE TALE OF PIGLING BLAND GINGER AND PICKLES
#Text=Once upon a time there were four little Rabbits , and their names were -- Flopsy , Mopsy , Cotton-tail , and Peter .
#Text=They lived with their Mother in a sand-bank , underneath the root of a very big fir-tree .

#Text=" Now , my dears , " said old Mrs. Rabbit one morning , " you may go into the fields or down the lane , but do n't go into Mr. McGregor 's garden : your Father had an accident there ; he was put in a pie by Mrs. McGregor .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= Now run along , and do n't get into mischief .
